pr_title: Kogito Travel Agency support for Business Key

timeline.message:
Kogito Travel Agency support for Business Key

- Auto generated travel code
- Added missing changes from previous demos: favicon and cors

Kogito Travel Agency support for Business Key

- Auto generated travel code
- Added missing changes from previous demos: favicon and cors
- Add Kogito service url

timeline.author: ricardozanini

replies.bodyText: I'm actually generating something like a reservation code ( 6 digits upper case ), like the one we get when doing a flight booking :) so not exactly the same thing as uuid
replies.author: cristianonicolai
